attributes.trait_type: large button mushrooms, stems removed and finely chopped

attributes.value:
Instructions:
Prepare the Mushrooms:

Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
Clean the mushroom caps and remove the stems. Finely chop the stems and set aside.
Cook the Filling:

In a skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat.
Add the minced garlic and chopped mushroom stems, and cook until softened, about 3-4 minutes.
Add the chopped spinach and cook until wilted, about 2 minutes.
Remove from heat and stir in the crumbled feta cheese, breadcrumbs, grated Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
Stuff the Mushrooms:

Spoon the spinach and feta mixture into each mushroom cap, pressing down slightly to pack the filling.
Bake:

Arrange the stuffed mushrooms on a baking sheet.
Bake in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender and the filling is golden brown.
Serve:

Transfer to a serving platter and serve warm.
